mod_type.Canonicizers:
Canonicize/normalize input texts with a few standard methods.
This may include replacing multiple white-spaces with a single white-space or conform all Latin letters to lower case
mod_type.EventDrivers: Turn texts into lists of characteristic features (if ordered, also called "events") to analyze
mod_type.EventCulling:
Filter features or events such that
only those fitting certain criteria are analyzed
mod_type.Embeddings:
Convert text features into numbers and vectors
to pass to the classifiers
mod_type.AnalysisMethods:
Use statistical inference tools including
machine learning algorithms to predict document category
mod_type.DistanceFunctions:
For algorithms that use a distance metric,
specify which metric to use
